content: The German translators, always late, hadn't translated this sentence yet, and Tom and Mary worried as to whether they should go through another translation to reach the sentence in Lojban.
translations: ita:I traduttori tedeschi, sempre in ritardo, non hanno ancora tradotto questa frase, e Tom e Mary si sono preoccupati di do
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by sacredceltic (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
